alert.message: Kinematic Viscosity and/or Density out of range!
alert.name: Density Sensor TimeSeries alert

targets.query:
from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "concentration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Frequence_${Frequency_index}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "concentration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Impedance_${Frequency_index}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "concentration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Phase_${Frequency_index}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "concentration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "pump_gpio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "State")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "Data/1000000033fec2d1/pump_gpio")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

pH = from(bucket: "hydraulic-smart-controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperature" or r["_field"] == "PhValue")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor"])
  |> rename(columns: {Temperature: "Temperature_pH"})

density = from(bucket: "hydraulic-smart-controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DENSITY")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Density" or r["_field"] == "DynamicViscosity" or r["_field"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "DENSITY")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with kinematicViscosity: (r.DynamicViscosity/r.Density)*1000.0
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["DynamicViscosity", "sensor"])
  |> rename(columns: {Temperature: "Temperature_density"})

conductivity = from(bucket: "hydraulic-smart-controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CONDUCTIVITY")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Salinity" or r["_field"] == "Tds" or r["_field"] == "Temperature" or r["_field"] == "ElectricalConductivity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor"])
  |> rename(columns: {Temperature: "Temperature_conductivity"})

TempRelH = from(bucket: "hydraulic-smart-controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "T9501")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperature" or r["_field"] == "RelativeHumidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor"])
  |> rename(columns: {Temperature: "Temperature_T9501"})

pH_desnity_join = join (
    tables: {pH: pH, density: density},
    on: ["_time", "_stop", "_start"]
)

conductivity_join = join (
    tables: {pH_desnity_join: pH_desnity_join, conductivity: conductivity},
    on: ["_time", "_stop", "_start"]
)

join (
    tables: {conductivity_join: conductivity_join, TempRelH: TempRelH},
    on: ["_time", "_stop", "_start"]
)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement_pH", "_measurement_density", "_measurement_conductivity_join", "_measurement_TempRelH"])
  |> map(fn: (r) =>
  { 
    return {
      start: v.timeRangeStart,
      stop: v.timeRangeStop
    }
  })

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "pH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PhValue")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "pH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ElectricalConductivity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Salinity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Tds")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity" or r["sensor_name"] == "concentration" or r["sensor_name"] == "pH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "pH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PhValue")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ElectricalConductivity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Salinity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Tds")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "pH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PhCalibrationRawAd" or r["_field"] == "PhCalibrationRawAd0" or r["_field"] == "PhCalibrationRawAd1" or r["_field"] == "PhCalibrationRawAd2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "OilMonitoringData")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "1000000033fec2d1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor_name"] == "conductivity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "EcRawAd" or r["_field"] == "EcTempCoff" or r["_field"] == "SalinityCoff" or r["_field"] == "TdsCoff" or r["_field"] == "ElectrodeConst" or r["_field"] == "EcCalib_1413" or r["_field"] == "EcCalib_12880")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
